name: The Artist
description: The Artist is a first person puzzle adventure inspired by other mysterious puzzle games like Myst, The Witness, and Firewatch. Sucked into The Artist's canvas world, you must solve the strange puzzles scattered across his island to find a way back home. If you fail, you will be trapped in the canvas forever.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
